alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued March 05 at 9:04PM MST until March 05 at 9:45PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Southeastern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Southeastern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 945 PM MST. * At 904 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 3 miles east of Curlew Lake to 3 miles west of Railroad Buttes, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Poor visibility in heavy snow. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 78 and 99. Locations impacted include... New Underwood, Wasta, Owanka, Elm Springs, Farmingdale, Wicksville, Curlew Lake and Railroad Buttes. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
